They had three sons - Dadi (Adrian Pang), Dashan (San Yow) and Daqiu (Cavin Soh). Zhou Dong disappeared after a kidnap attempt went awry; not even his body was found.

programme.title: L'imagier Anime De Koumi - EP 26
programme.desc: At 6 years old the cheerful mischievous Koumi dreams of knowing all the animals in the world. Thanks to her picture book, she's able to head off and meet them.

programme.title: Taffy - EP 57
programme.desc: Wealthy Mrs. Muchmore lives in a manor with her beloved dog Bentley. One day, Scraggs the raccoon turns up disguised as a cat. Immediately adopted by the old lady, he becomes Taffy and laps up her attention. But Bentley is not fooled and decides to chase him off his territory.

programme.title: Kididoc - EP 45
programme.desc: Kidi, a kind-hearted artificial intelligence, guides Pomme and Fix on their journey through Kidi-World. From dinosaurs to the Chateau de Versailles, the human body to the history of aviation: Kidi-World is not only an adventure-filled wonderland but also, and above all, a means of finding the answer to every question.

programme.title: Kididoc - EP 46
programme.desc: Kidi, a kind-hearted artificial intelligence, guides Pomme and Fix on their journey through Kidi-World. programme.title: Nubu Et Yara - EP 28
programme.desc: Young Nubu is a little boy who's curious about everything but makes one blunder after another as he learns about life. Fortunately his wiser more responsible older sister, Yara, always has the time to explain things, offering the perfect opportunity for Nubu to dive into his own comic book world.

programme.title: 1001 Mondes Antiques - EP 2
programme.desc: Braillard, Colombe and Lablatte have discovered a way to travel through time and ancient civilisations. They journey back in time to the Middle Ages, in search of answers. How did people live in those days? How did they heal themselves? How did they see that justice was done?

programme.title: L'afrik En Contes - EP 5
programme.desc: A woman has four children. The youngest was born just as her husband died; convinced the baby is a bringer of bad luck she refuses to feed him. One day, the hyena Bouki becomes interested in this unwanted child.

programme.title: Quasimodo - EP 22
programme.desc: Paris, 1483. 16-year-old Quasimodo is a hunchbacked orphan. One day, the gypsy Esmeralda, with whom he is in love, finds herself in trouble. He sacrifices himself to save her and ends up in prison. And so begins a long series of adventures...

programme.title: Pfffirates - EP 14
programme.desc: On the island of Calypso, Captain Lamar is busy training his crews in the art of pfffiracy. Between lessons in navigation, treasure hunts and boarding other ships, it's a busy programme for everyone. But it'll take more than that to deflate Pat, Lily and Stede: the threesome feel invincible!

programme.title: 7 Jours - EP 14
programme.desc: ''7 jours'', a weekly magazine programme covering news on society and international events to know all there is to know... in French

programme.title: Falò
programme.desc: A news magazine show, ''Falò'' discusses and analyses current affairs in depth.

programme.title: Objectif Monde L'hebdo
programme.desc: Report, inquiry, investigation ... ''Objectif Monde L'Hebdo'', a television magazine by French-speaking editorialists, takes time to reflect and analyse through the expert insights and opinions provided by specialists. A TV5MONDE programme, jointly produced with RTS, in collaboration with its francophone partners (RTBF, Radio-Canada, France Televisions).

programme.title: Territoires De France
programme.desc: Discovering the treasures of the French regions, the initiatives and people who bring them to life.

programme.title: Le Magazine De La Riviera
programme.desc: The magazine programme all about the art of living in Monaco, Provence and on the Cote d'Azur.

programme.title: #Helvetica
programme.desc: What values are dear to the heart of Switzerland's most influential figures? How do they see the country, its know-how and its successes? We meet some of those taking Switzerland to the top in the fields of economics, politics, science, culture...

programme.title: Rassemblance - EP 15
programme.desc: After arriving in Marseille, Ben Amir Saadi revealed himself through his sporting achievements. After studying computer engineering, the Comorian became an entrepreneur. Father of four, storyteller and co-founder of fair trade brand Maana Sport, Ben Amir is today an activist helping Marseille's more difficult neighbourhoods, and sharing his community's culture.

programme.title: Le Match Dans Le Match
programme.desc: A key figure from the world of sport looks back at a particular competition, a career, an outstanding moment.

programme.title: Le Journal De Radio-Canada

programme.title: 400 Millions De Critiques - EP 15

programme.title: Sur Le Front - EP 28
programme.desc: In a country proud of its 365 cheeses, an investigation into the hidden side of intensive dairy production. Originally almost every variety was linked to a specific breed of cow. Today the traditional breeds are increasingly replaced by those which are the most productive, making a less authentic cheese.

programme.title: Vendee Globe 2024
programme.desc: Daily summary of the 10th Vendee Globe, non-stop solo sailing race around the world with no assistance. The skippers cover around 45,000 km crossing the world, passing the Cape of Good Hope, Cape Leeuwin and Cape Horn. Arrival and departure: Les Sables d'Olonne.

programme.title: Version Francaise - EP 6
programme.desc: The Hotel de la Marine, Paris, covers two hundred and fifty years of naval history. Multi-talented artist, Aurelie Galois paints industrial canvases in rubber, just like little secret boxes. Designer Peter Do: for the love of material and the perfect cut. Agnes Kappler makes tarot cards the old-fashioned way.

programme.desc: A general knowledge quiz.

programme.desc: A major interview focusing on world news, proposed by TV5MONDE.

programme.title: Tv5 Monde, Le Journal

programme.title: Les Freres Taloche - Mise A Jour
programme.desc: A brand new show, written by Vincent Taloche and Bruno Taloche. On the programme: uncommon airline pilots, a beginner dentist, an (all too) amateur comedian, a photo exhibition on the Middle Ages, a lesson about renewable energy, and not forgetting the Taloche Mime Games plus plenty of surprises!

programme.title: Femmes De L'art - EP 6
programme.desc: It was said of her that: ''Eve had finally become Adam's equal''. A society artist, liberated and uninhibited in the Paris of the interwar years, Lempicka mainly painted female nudes and portraits, mixing a modern aesthetic and mannerism, in the style of the Roaring Twenties.

programme.title: Tandem - Retour Vers Le Passe
programme.desc: Lea and Paul, head-over-heels in love, head off on holiday in Annie and Pierre's new house. Far from Montpellier and the police station, they intend making the most of this family time. Until the discovery of a human arm forces them to investigate. Where is the rest of the body?

programme.title: Sibovoyage - EP 3
programme.desc: Totally transformed over a very short period of time: Tangiers and Rabat, two of Morocco's must-visit cities, successfully crossed into the 21st century and positioned themselves as the cultural avant-garde of North Africa, whilst losing none of their ancient charm and the attraction of their seaside.

programme.title: D'ou Viens-Tu Johnny ?
programme.desc: Without knowing it, Johnny, a young rock musician, finds himself involved with a drugs gang. Realising he was being manipulated, he threw the drugs into the Seine and took refuge in the Camargue with his family and his fiancee, Gigi. Meanwhile, the dealers are hot on their heels..

programme.title: En Piste !
programme.desc: Pauline is the witness at her best friend's wedding and hopes to take advantage of this special day to get closer to the handsome Raphael. But she finds it hard to let her gaze stray from her handicapped daughter, Emma, who she didn't want to leave with a childminder.

programme.desc: Accompanied by the guide Benoit Croteau and his daughter elie, Brad tries his hand at canoe camping near Pikogan in Anicinape Aki. Between fishing for sturgeon and running the rapids, the Harricana River offers the perfect opportunity to pass on traditional knowledge.

programme.title: Partir Autrement Entre Amis - EP 7
programme.desc: Simon Boulerice and Noemie Yelle explore the Amari Valley in Crete. On the programme for their visit: outdoor activities and Cretan gastronomy.

programme.title: Un Dimanche A La Campagne
programme.desc: A weekend together, far from the hustle and bustle of everyday life. A moment out of time to get to know one another, talk of love, friendship, life. The race has acquired an international reputation, attracting skippers from all over the world.

programme.title: 1-to-11 2024/25 - EP 9
programme.desc: Former Premier League stars select their dream teams from the best they played with or against, guiding us through their picks with stories from on and off the pitch.

programme.title: West Ham United vs Wolverhampton Wanderers (MW15) - EP 150
programme.desc: West Ham have conceded 71 goals in 33 Premier League games so far in 2024 - it’s their most league goals conceded in a single calendar year since 1976 (73 in 38 games).

programme.title: PL Rewind 2024/25 - EP 9
programme.desc: One of the Premier League's most electrifying talents, Jay Jay Okocha lit up English football in the early 2000s. The Nigerian reflects on his time at Bolton Wanderers, where he made an unforgettable impression on the league.

programme.title: Fulham vs Arsenal (MW15) - EP 146
programme.desc: Fulham are unbeaten in their last eight league London derbies (W4 D4), their longest such run since a run of nine between February 2000 and September 2001, a streak that was ended by a 3-1 home loss to Arsenal.

programme.title: PL Stories 2024/25 - EP 28
programme.desc: We explore the remarkable journeys of players who made their mark on the Premier League stage as teenagers. From prodigious talents to record-breakers, we tell the stories of these fearless young stars who defied expectations and changed the game forever.

programme.title: Arsenal vs Everton (MW16) (Live) - EP 151
programme.desc: Arsenal’s 102 wins against Everton is the most any side has beaten another in English top-flight history, while their 344 top-flight goals against the Toffees is also the most.

programme.title: The Big Interview 2024/25 - EP 18
programme.desc: Extended sit-downs and more informal ‘out and about’ interviews with the Premier League’s biggest stars, providing players with a platform to tell their story in their own words.

programme.title: PL Rewind 2024/25 - EP 9

programme.title: 1-to-11 2024/25 - EP 9

programme.title: Tottenham Hotspur vs Chelsea (MW15) - EP 149
programme.desc: Tottenham have won just one of their last 11 Premier League games against Chelsea (D2 L8), picking up a 2-0 home win in February 2023.

programme.title: Wolverhampton Wanderers vs Ipswich Town (MW16) - EP 154
programme.desc: This is the first ever Premier League meeting between Wolves and Ipswich. The Tractor Boys have won six of the last seven top-flight games between the sides (L1), most recently a 3-0 away win in April 1984.

programme.title: Newcastle United vs Leicester City (MW16) - EP 153
programme.desc: Leicester have won six Premier League away games against Newcastle, more than they have versus any other opponent. Five of these victories have come in their last seven visits to St James’ Park.

programme.title: Match Day Live Extra 2024/25 - EP 16
programme.desc: A complete review of all the day’s Premier League football, with highlights and studio discussion.

programme.title: Liverpool vs Fulham (MW16) - EP 152
programme.desc: Liverpool have won nine of their last 12 Premier League meetings with Fulham (D2 L1), with their only defeat in that time a 1-0 loss at Anfield in March 2021.

programme.title: Arsenal vs Everton (MW16) - EP 151
programme.desc: Arsenal’s 102 wins against Everton is the most any side has beaten another in English top-flight history, while their 344 top-flight goals against the Toffees is also the most.

programme.desc: This will be Nottingham Forest’s 5,000th match in the top four tiers of English football, the 12th side to reach that milestone in English Football League history.

programme.title: FIGHT SPORTS MMA Dricus Du Plessis vs. Brendan Lesar
programme.desc: Check out exciting action from MMA organizations around the world. This episode features main event Dricus 'Stillknocks' Du Plessis vs. Brendan Lesar in the Middleweight Championsihp from EFC 83 in Pretoria, South Africa.

programme.title: WCCB Artur Beterbiev vs. Tavoris Cloud
programme.desc: Coming off a tremendous amateur career where he captured Gold Medals in the World Championships and European Championships, Olympian Artur Beterbiev takes a big step up in competition in just his 6th pro fight, taking on former IBF Light Heavyweight World Champion Tavoris Cloud. Beterbiev had stormed through his first five opponents, scoring four knockouts, two of which took place in the first round.

programme.title: Fight Quest
programme.desc: Episode 10: California, USA - Hosts Jimmy Smith and Doug Anderson learn the Fight Discipline of Kajukenbo and the Martial Art of Hands, Feet and Throws with Masters Charles Gaylord and Greg Harper.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Paul Williams vs. Antonio Margarito
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is a WBO welterweight title bout featuring then-undefeated Paul Williams and Antonio Margarito. It's a closely scored bout, but one fighter's push towards a strong finish may have put him ahead just enough.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 3 featuring Mitakeumi, Abi, Hakuho and Chiyotairyu from the Aki basho, 2018.

programme.title: Judo for the World
programme.desc: Judo for the World features the best competitors in the sport as they compete in a global tour for an opportunity to vie for the gold in the World Judo Championship. In this episode we see the best judo of the World Team Championships from Budapest, where we will see history made as it's the first time a new mixed gender team format will be seen.

programme.title: MMA:30
programme.desc: This episode features interviews with 2-time UFC heavyweight champion Frank Mir where he discusses his "Legend" Status and his UFC debut, as well as an interview with his wife and manager Jenny Mir and how she juggles motherhood and her husband's career. UFC President Dana White stops by and checks out some possible TUF competitors.

programme.title: WCCB Gervonta Davis vs. Hector Luis Garcia
programme.desc: Five time World Champion and boxing superstar Gervonta 'Tank' Davis and undefeated World Champion Hector Luis Garcia kick off the year by headlining a stacked card from the Capital One Arena in Washington DC. Davis has established himself as one boxing's must-see attractions, and will be defending his WBA Lightweight World Championship against Garcia in the Main Event.

programme.title: World Karate Federation
programme.desc: The highest level of competition in the sport of karate anywhere in the world will take place from Budapest, Hungary, as the WKF SENIOR WORLD CHAMPIONSHIPS take place. The top competitors from across the globe, from six different continents, will all converge on Budapest to stake their claim as the best in the world. Don't miss the WKF SENIOR WORLD CHAMPIONSHIPS, only on FIGHT SPORTS.

programme.title: Wide World of Fights Shane Mosley vs. Saul (Canelo) Alvarez
programme.desc: This episode features the WBC light middleweight title bout when Shane Mosley battles Saul (Canelo) Alvarez, as well as kickboxing, sumo and more!

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Bernard Hopkins vs. Winky Wright
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is a light heavyweight title contest featuring 47-4-1 Bernard Hopkins and the 51-3-1 Winky Wright, who has not lost a bout in over seven years.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. Show 4 featuring Goeido, Abi, Kisenosato and Tochinoshin from the Aki basho, 2018.

programme.title: Macho: The Hector Camacho Story
programme.desc: This series takes a hard-hitting look at the rise, fall and untimely death of one of boxing's most colorful champions. Hector Camacho's dynamic speed, footwork and power made him a fighter to be reckoned with, but it was his flamboyance and showmanship that ushered in a new era in boxing. The series chronicles his epic battles inside the ring, his struggles with addiction outside of it and the mystery of the double homicide that claimed his life.

programme.title: Tuesday Night Fights Hector Camacho vs. Rusty Derouen
programme.desc: FIGHT SPORTS revisits some of Hector Camacho's best fights from the legendary USA's Tuesday Night Fights series alongside our new documentary series Macho: The Hector Camacho Story. In this episode Hector 'Macho' Camacho (46-3-0, 20 KO) battles Rusty Derouen (33-6-0, 25 KO) in a 10-round Halbmittel contest from Erie, Pennsylvania, USA.

programme.title: WCCB Firat Arslan vs. Yoan Pablo Hernandez
programme.desc: From the Messehall in Erfurt, Germany, IBF Cruiserweight World Champion Yoan Pablo Hernandez looks to defend his title for the fourth time, taking on former WBA Cruiserweight World Champion Firat Arslan. Hernandez comes into this bout having won fourteen straight fights, including recent back to back victories over former champion Steve Cunningham.

programme.title: Greatest Classics Derrell Coley vs. Kip Diggs / Fernando Vargas vs. Jose Morales
programme.desc: FIGHT SPORTS presents another excitingGreatest Classics episode, bringing you more action featuring the greatest fighters in boxing history. In a fight for the vacant NABF Welterweight Championship, evenly matched Derrell Coley (29-1-2) and Kip Diggs (27-2) square off in what would be a classic back-and-forth battle, with multiple knockdowns and a fight to close to call on the judges' scorecards.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Ricky Hatton vs. Paul Malignaggi
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is a battle of fighters who have just one loss to their record, as Ricky Hatton battles Paulie Malignaggi in a light welterweight championship bout that was billed as "Power vs. Precision." Also on the card, future heavyweight champion Tyson Fury battles with Steve Cunningham.

programme.title: American Ninja Warrior
programme.desc: The next season opens with a qualifying round in Venice Beach, California. More than half of the obstacles used on this season were never seen before, and this premiere features exciting new challenges such as the Frame Slider, Domino Hill, Chain Swing and Flying Nun Chucks. Returning fan favorites in Venice Beach include parkour enthusiasts Kyle Cochran and Brent Steffensen.

programme.title: Teletubbies (S1) - EP 95
programme.desc: Tinky Winky finds a party invitation and shows it to Dipsy, Laa-Laa and Po. The invitation takes flight and the Teletubbies follow it to find a Tiddlytubbies' party.

programme.title: Yakka Dee (S2) - EP 14
programme.desc: Dee encourages a friend to say 'tree' and we go on a whirlwind word adventure! We see a prickly tree, a tickly tree and even meet a friendly family of trees.

programme.title: Pop Paper City (S1) - EP 30
programme.desc: The friends travel into outer space to visit Planet Popbeam. Mae-Mae wonders if the planet is made of cheese, but Phoebe thinks it's made of rock.

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO (S1) - EP 8
programme.desc: Messy brushes his teeth, but why must we use toothpaste and a toothbrush to get teeth clean? He goes to OKIDO to find out.

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 7
programme.desc: Bluey can't get to sleep, so Mum reads her one last story. But they are interrupted by Unicorse, the most annoying hand puppet in the world, whom Bluey tries to reform.

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 8
programme.desc: Bingo and Dad must brave a swooping magpie protecting its nest, when they go on a curry swap to Mackenzie's house through the park.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S5) - EP 2
programme.desc: The Squirrels are looking for Duggee but can't find him. Instead, they find someone who looks like Enid, only much too big. Duggee has painted his face to look like Enid!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S5) - EP 1
programme.desc: The Squirrels are admiring Duggee's crop of giant carrots when they hear a noise. They find the Rabbits busy preparing for the Carrot Solstice.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 35
programme.desc: The Squirrels are having fun playing a song they made, but they wish that they could see themselves perform. Duggee has a great suggestion, and they learn how to be creative.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) - EP 44
programme.desc: The team roars into action as Glitch tries to take a selfie with a lion in the Maasai Mara.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) - EP 43
programme.desc: A game of hide and seek threatens to topple the fairy chimneys of Cappadocia in Turkey.

programme.title: Bluey (S2) - EP 2
programme.desc: On a trip to Hammerbarn, Bluey and Bingo create their own mini-homes side-by-side in the trolley. But Bluey quickly gets jealous of her neighbour, Bingo.

programme.title: Bluey (S2) - EP 1
programme.desc: After Dad eats her last chip, Bingo is given three chances to put Mum and Dad in "Dance Mode" as payback. But the others can't resist taking Bingo's turns for her.

programme.title: Andy's Aquatic Adventures (S1) - EP 25
programme.desc: Andy jets off in his safari-mobile to the river Nile in search of some African elephants.

programme.title: Ranger Hamza's Eco Quest (S2) - EP 7
programme.desc: Ranger Hamza and the Ramblers go on an eco quest to find out all about orchards.

programme.title: Swashbuckle (S8) - EP 1
programme.desc: In this episode Captain Captain has just finished writing her musical theatre masterpiece called Captain Captain - The Musical! Written by and starring herself, with Sandy and Seaweed!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) - EP 27
programme.desc: The Squirrels have played all of their board games, so Duggee entertains them.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) - EP 21
programme.desc: The squirrels have to solve the mystery of the missing red ruby.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) - EP 20
programme.desc: It's crazy golf time and the everyone has to make their own courses.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) - EP 27
programme.desc: The Go Jetters are off to see the Geysers in Iceland, but Grandmaster Glitch and the Grimbots have beaten them to it, and managed to get themselves stuck in the Geysers.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) - EP 26
programme.desc: The Go Jetters visit London on New Year's Eve, but Big Ben is missing! To the Vroomster!

programme.title: Thomas & Friends (S23) - EP 8
programme.desc: While working on the Brazilian Railway, Thomas and Gabriela get ready for the Batucada carnival at the docks.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S3) - EP 28
programme.desc: Scarf Lady helps Sarah & Duck catch the fluffs and puffs to refill their pancaked pillows.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S3) - EP 27
programme.desc: Sarah, Duck & Bug set off on a big adventure, through uncharted territory, as they attempt to cycle all the way around the park.

programme.title: Nelly and Nora (S1) - EP 35
programme.desc: The sun shows special things to Nelly and Nora.

programme.title: Dog Loves Books (S1) - EP 9
programme.desc: Dog and Pug arrive on a desert island and find a pirate who has lost his treasure.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) - EP 18
programme.desc: Monty is disappointed to find the cubby house Stan built him is empty inside, until he begins to fill it with his imagination.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran (S1) - EP 20
programme.desc: JoJo and Gran Gran are watering Cynthia's flowers while she's away on holiday. JoJo would like to go on holiday too, so JoJo and Gran Gran have a stay-at-home holiday in the park!

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 5
programme.desc: Dad pretends he was born yesterday. Bluey and Bingo have to guide him through his second day on Earth, especially when he discovers food is delicious and steals Lucky's Dad's pie.

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 6
programme.desc: When Dad complains about how dissimilar Bluey and Bingo are, Bluey hatches a plan to make them more alike and happily introduces Mini-Bluey!

programme.title: Bluey (S3) - EP 7
programme.desc: Bluey can't get to sleep, so Mum reads her one last story. But they are interrupted by Unicorse, the most annoying hand puppet in the world, whom Bluey tries to reform.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) - EP 19
programme.desc: The Squirrels learn about different types of art and what inspires it.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) - EP 18
programme.desc: The Squirrels get an interactive history lesson from Duggee and a host of famous faces.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) - EP 17
programme.desc: Duggee and the Squirrels bake a pie and learn how to share by dividing things between them

programme.title: Go Jetters (S1) - EP 24
programme.desc: On a very foggy day, The Golden Gate Bridge's foghorns are missing. Can the Go Jetters help?

programme.title: Roots & Fruits (S1) - EP 17
programme.desc: Watermelon performs a body tap routine.

programme.title: Roots & Fruits (S1) - EP 16
programme.desc: Little artichoke sings about being the rhyming queen.

programme.title: Supertato (S1) - EP 46
programme.desc: Carrot wants to become super strong, so she restores Evil Pea's robot suit for herself.

programme.title: Supertato (S1) - EP 47
programme.desc: Evil Pea is tricked by lots of Supertatoes who appear all over the supermarket.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 15
programme.desc: Duggee masters his ambition of building a model of the Clubhouse out of sticks. This encourages the Squirrels to think of their own ambitions, and how they can achieve them.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 16
programme.desc: The Squirrels see a rainbow for the very first time, but it disappears so quickly! Together they decide to create a rainbow themselves from everything around them.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 17
programme.desc: The Squirrels are playing, but they can't stop thinking about the dreams they had last night. Duggee has his dream badge, so can he help the squirrels work out what their dreams mean.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 18
programme.desc: The Squirrels are having a picnic and notice that the chickens eat differently than they do. Duggee has his eating badge and can explain all the different ways animals eat.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 19
programme.desc: Chipmunk is cycling one day delivering his packages when he hits a rock and his trike falls apart! He has so many packages to deliver - what is he going to do now?

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 20
programme.desc: As Peggee and the Hummingbirds journey up the river to deliver a parcel, they have fun spotting and avoiding the wildlife that they meet along the way.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 21
programme.desc: After finding out that Mr Wobbly is visiting next Monday, the Squirrels impatiently want to know how long that means they need to wait.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 22
programme.desc: The Squirrels notice that Happy isn't acting like his normal self, and he's strangely wearing new trainers. Happy doesn't know what he's feeling, and his friends want to help him.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 23
programme.desc: The Squirrels become enchanted when they hear a piece of music from Duggee's choir. They quickly learn what makes a choir.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 24
programme.desc: The Squirrels hear a strange sound that they've not heard before, so they ask Duggee to help identify it.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 25
programme.desc: The Squirrels see Duggee reading about wise animals and wish to learn more about what it means to be wise.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 26
programme.desc: Norrie is running late to Squirrel Club, so Duggee teaches the squirrels what a commute is - a journey that can take you from home to learn, work or play.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 27
programme.desc: The Squirrels are confused when they see Duggee sitting on a ball because they all have their own favourite way of using it, whether it be kicking, throwing or catching.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 28
programme.desc: After learning that Duggee is making his yearly batch of blueberry jam, a tradition passed on from his great-aunt, the Squirrels decide to spread the news.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 29
programme.desc: As the Squirrels appreciate Norrie's new bike, they discover that she doesn't know how to ride it, she finds it too difficult.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 30
programme.desc: Before the Squirrels attend the cinema for the first time, Duggee teaches them that there are rules they need to follow.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 31
programme.desc: The Squirrels are getting ready for the same woodland adventure, but their mornings all look slightly different.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 32
programme.desc: The Squirrels learn about atoms, molecules and cells to help understand sizing when they try to sort a line-up of things from smallest to biggest.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 33
programme.desc: Whilst helping Duggee clean up, the Squirrels come across an old lamp. Duggee explains that many years ago, when rubbed, it could grant three magical wishes.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 34
programme.desc: Duggee has lost the list he made for the Squirrel's activities for the day at Squirrel Club. After a quick lesson on what a list is, they are happy to help Duggee recreate his.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 35
programme.desc: The Squirrels are having fun playing a song they made, but they wish that they could see themselves perform. Duggee has a great suggestion, and they learn how to be creative.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 36
programme.desc: Duggee and the Squirrels set off on a warm-up run together. The Squirrels are feeling sleepy, but they are told that a bit of exercise will wake them up!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 37
programme.desc: The Squirrels are causing a bit too much mess in the clubhouse, so Duggee explains that they need to think more carefully about what they are doing.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 38
programme.desc: The Squirrels can learn more about nature and wildlife if they follow five easy steps: watch carefully, stay at a distance, don't interfere, be patient and alert, and stay quiet.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 39
programme.desc: The hungry Squirrels turn to Duggee when they aren't sure what to eat. Fortunately, he has his cookbook The Clubhouse Kitchen: Tasty Bites for Hungry Squirrels.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 40
programme.desc: When the Squirrels tell Duggee that they have nothing left to play with, he encourages them to use their imagination.

programme.desc: It's raining, so Duggee and the squirrels stay indoors to do some drawing.

programme.desc: Happy finds a cake lying around in the field and decides to eat it. But whose cake is it?

programme.desc: Duggee is having a bad hair day. Can the squirrels help him at all?

programme.desc: The Squirrels are out tobogganing with Duggee when they spot a bird fall from the sky.

programme.desc: The Squirrels find a treasure map inside Duggee's big shiny ruby.

programme.desc: The birds keep eating Duggee's grain, so the squirrels build a scarecrow.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) - EP 21
programme.desc: The Squirrels meet a little worm. It's swallowed a bit too much earth and has the hiccups.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S1) - EP 22
programme.desc: The Squirrels build a maze out of all the things in Duggee's workshop.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 15
programme.desc: Duggee masters his ambition of building a model of the Clubhouse out of sticks. This encourages the Squirrels to think of their own ambitions, and how they can achieve them.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 16
programme.desc: The Squirrels see a rainbow for the very first time, but it disappears so quickly! Together they decide to create a rainbow themselves from everything around them.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 17
programme.desc: The Squirrels are playing, but they can't stop thinking about the dreams they had last night. Duggee has his dream badge, so can he help the squirrels work out what their dreams mean.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 18
programme.desc: The Squirrels are having a picnic and notice that the chickens eat differently than they do. Duggee has his eating badge and can explain all the different ways animals eat.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 19
programme.desc: Chipmunk is cycling one day delivering his packages when he hits a rock and his trike falls apart! He has so many packages to deliver - what is he going to do now?

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 20
programme.desc: As Peggee and the Hummingbirds journey up the river to deliver a parcel, they have fun spotting and avoiding the wildlife that they meet along the way.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 21
programme.desc: After finding out that Mr Wobbly is visiting next Monday, the Squirrels impatiently want to know how long that means they need to wait.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 22
programme.desc: The Squirrels notice that Happy isn't acting like his normal self, and he's strangely wearing new trainers. Happy doesn't know what he's feeling, and his friends want to help him.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 23
programme.desc: The Squirrels become enchanted when they hear a piece of music from Duggee's choir. They quickly learn what makes a choir.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 24
programme.desc: The Squirrels hear a strange sound that they've not heard before, so they ask Duggee to help identify it.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 25
programme.desc: The Squirrels see Duggee reading about wise animals and wish to learn more about what it means to be wise.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 26
programme.desc: Norrie is running late to Squirrel Club, so Duggee teaches the squirrels what a commute is - a journey that can take you from home to learn, work or play.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 27
programme.desc: The Squirrels are confused when they see Duggee sitting on a ball because they all have their own favourite way of using it, whether it be kicking, throwing or catching.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 28
programme.desc: After learning that Duggee is making his yearly batch of blueberry jam, a tradition passed on from his great-aunt, the Squirrels decide to spread the news.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 29
programme.desc: As the Squirrels appreciate Norrie's new bike, they discover that she doesn't know how to ride it, she finds it too difficult.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 30
programme.desc: Before the Squirrels attend the cinema for the first time, Duggee teaches them that there are rules they need to follow.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 31
programme.desc: The Squirrels are getting ready for the same woodland adventure, but their mornings all look slightly different.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 32
programme.desc: The Squirrels learn about atoms, molecules and cells to help understand sizing when they try to sort a line-up of things from smallest to biggest.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 33
programme.desc: Whilst helping Duggee clean up, the Squirrels come across an old lamp. Duggee explains that many years ago, when rubbed, it could grant three magical wishes.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 34
programme.desc: Duggee has lost the list he made for the Squirrel's activities for the day at Squirrel Club. After a quick lesson on what a list is, they are happy to help Duggee recreate his.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 35
programme.desc: The Squirrels are having fun playing a song they made, but they wish that they could see themselves perform. Duggee has a great suggestion, and they learn how to be creative.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 36
programme.desc: Duggee and the Squirrels set off on a warm-up run together. The Squirrels are feeling sleepy, but they are told that a bit of exercise will wake them up!

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 37
programme.desc: The Squirrels are causing a bit too much mess in the clubhouse, so Duggee explains that they need to think more carefully about what they are doing.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 38
programme.desc: The Squirrels can learn more about nature and wildlife if they follow five easy steps: watch carefully, stay at a distance, don't interfere, be patient and alert, and stay quiet.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 39
programme.desc: The hungry Squirrels turn to Duggee when they aren't sure what to eat. Fortunately, he has his cookbook The Clubhouse Kitchen: Tasty Bites for Hungry Squirrels.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S4) - EP 40
programme.desc: When the Squirrels tell Duggee that they have nothing left to play with, he encourages them to use their imagination.

programme.desc: The fairies are giving a big fairy flying display in Toyland. Fairy Coco is devastated when her wings disappear just before the Flying Display. Queen Sparklewings tells Noddy that the wings will only work for Fairy Coco and if anybody else tries to use them it would be dangerous as they may fall and hurt themselves. Noddy immediately stars to investigate. Following all the clues, he works out that Smartysaurus found the wings after Fairy Coco took them off in the Fairy Garden.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales S1 - EP 49
programme.desc: You see there was a time when Mole didn't live underground. She had tiny weenie ears where every little sound made her ears hurt. Unfortunately Tinga Tinga could be a very noisy place. Then one night when Elephant's snoring, Jackal's howling and Owl's twit-twooing get too much Mole decides to DIG. She digs and she digs and she digs.... until she finds total quiet. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales S1 - EP 50
programme.desc: You see there was a time when Squirrel didn't gather nuts; she was far too busy braiding her bushy tail. Then one day there is very little food in Tinga Tinga and Lion summons all the animals to pull together and help find food for everyone. Squirrel is too busy braiding her tail to join in, but when she finally realises that there is not enough food to go round she races around gathering nuts for all the animals. The thing is she can't stop! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car S2 - EP 49
programme.desc: Murray Walker is visiting Silver Hatch. Mr Carburettor would like him to commentate while the cars put on a stunt display. But Murray has other ideas… he admits he has always dreamed of racing himself. An unlikely candidate makes his dreams come true!

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car S2 - EP 50
programme.desc: Mr Carburettor's cousin Chubby is coming to Silver hatch as he wants to film his new blockbuster there. Everybody goes all out to prove that it is just the right location for Chubby's new film

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots S2 - EP 78
programme.desc: Poppy has got a new trike to do her deliveries on. But she doesn't know how to ride it properly and keeps crashing into things. The tots take matters into hand and help Poppy learn to ride her trike safely

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective S1 - EP 51
programme.desc: Noddy and his friends are having a "clown day" and everyone is going to play at being clowns. Noddy shows Fuse his smelling flower joke but Fuse realises he isn't programmed to understand clowning. The clowning goes too far when someone sets up a bucket of balls joke that almost causes an accident. Noddy needs to investigate to find out who is the unfunny clown before a ‘joke' goes too far.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective S1 - EP 52
programme.desc: Farmer Tom is having a Farm Fair at the Animal Acres Farm but it looks set to be ruined by an unexpected shower of carrots, cabbages and then pumpkins. Noddy and Deltoid investigate and discover the raining vegetables are caused by Smartysaurus, who is trying to find something heavy enough to go on the other end of her see-saw. She didn't realise that every time she sat on one end of the see-saw, she was sending the vegetables on the other end flying up into the air.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales S1 - EP 51
programme.desc: You see there was a time when Meerkat was not always on the lookout. Meerkat used to race around Tinga Tinga bumping into things and causing chaos. She never stayed still long enough to listen to any beast. But then one day Meerkat bumps into the Sleeping Stones... and they make her listen alright! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales S1 - EP 52
programme.desc: You see there was a time when Cheetah didn't have tears. She was the fastest animal in the whole of Tinga Tinga. Cheetah was faster than even the Wind. Every year Cheetah and Wind would race to see who was the fastest and every year Cheetah would win. Until one day.... Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Storage Wars (S14) - EP 311
programme.desc: Ivy is on the warpath in Lancaster, doing his best to intimidate the other buyers, and he won't be losing any sleep over it. Brandi begrudgingly lets Bozek decide which locker they buy.

programme.title: Storage Wars (S14) - EP 312
programme.desc: Barry utilises a tactic to snatch up a locker... and it ties him up in knots. Brandi shops in the bargain basement but puts on a show in the process. Ivy lands a large unit and the tools stack right up.

programme.title: Pawn Stars (S24) - EP 600
programme.desc: Rick races to nab a 1959 go-kart. Can he pave his way to a deal? A collection of toys from "Jurassic Park" comes roaring into the shop. But are these toys as dino-mite as Chum hopes?

programme.title: The Toys That Built The World (S2) - EP 4
programme.desc: Marvin Glass oversees the creation of many of the most iconic toys of the 20th century. From chattering teeth to a legendary game based on a mouse trap, Glass pushes the boundaries of what a toy can be.

programme.title: The Food That Built The World (S4) - EP 35
programme.desc: A Georgia diner owner discovers the chicken game when he creates a unique fried chicken sandwich with cast-off filets. The sandwich becomes the menu centrepiece at one of the most popular fast food chains.

programme.title: The Food That Built The World (S3) - EP 12
programme.desc: When brothers Hector and Mario Boiardi open an Italian restaurant in 1924, neither man realises their quest to introduce Italian food to Americans will result in one of the nation's most iconic brands.

programme.title: The Toys That Built The World (S2) - EP 5
programme.desc: After the U.S. video game crash of 1983, a Japanese electronics company single-handedly resurrects the industry with a game featuring a jumping plumber.

programme.title: Forged In Fire (S8)
programme.desc: For the first time, Judges Ben Abbott, J. Neilson and David Baker are thrown into the fire for a gruelling home forge battle against each other.

programme.title: Green Eyed Killers (S2) - EP 13
programme.desc: In a jealous rage, 48-year-old Michael Gunther killed girlfriend Sally Kennedy and then shot a man she was sleeping with, 36-year-old Michael Zawodny, 11 times at a carnival near Offutt Air Force Base.

programme.title: Panic 9-1-1 (S3) - EP 6
programme.desc: During the height of tornado season, a bride-to-be is trapped in a gully inside her overturned SUV. A terrified 11-year-old and her younger brother are home alone when their apartment goes up in flames.

programme.title: Cruise Ship Killers (S2) - EP 2
programme.desc: A couple go on a cruise to repair their marriage, but their week alone comes to a tragic end when her body falls from an upper deck. Is it an accident, or has something more sinister taken place?

programme.title: Booked: First Day In - EP 9
programme.desc: In Modesto, two men struggle with high bail amounts, and a 'frequent flyer' ends up back in jail after having a little too much boxed wine.

programme.title: Court Cam: Top 10 Moments Of 2021
programme.desc: A countdown of the top 10 moments of 2021 on Court Cam.

programme.desc: Joel Rifkin is providing clues to New York State Police in order to identify two of his 17 victims that remain nameless. Peter Reiss follows up with his own on-camera sit-down with Rifkin to get answers.

programme.desc: A traffic accident on the Interstate near Des Moines, Iowa, results in one casualty - but was it an accident or something more sinister?

programme.title: Evil Up Close (S6) - EP 7
programme.desc: Dubbed 'the vampire killer,' teen Mathew Hardman thought that taking a life would make him immortal. His victim was an elderly neighbour. After stabbing her, he removed her heart and drank her blood.

programme.title: The Torso Killer Confessions - EP 1
programme.desc: Bergen County (NJ) Chief of Detectives Robert Anzilotti elicited murder confessions from a vicious but relatively unknown serial killer - Richard Cottingham, nicknamed the Torso Killer.

programme.title: Hoarders (S14) - EP 1
programme.desc: Marjorie has collected items from thrift stores and estate sales over the years for various projects, which has led to a massive amount of clutter in her home, making living in the space very difficult.

programme.title: Hoarders (S14) - EP 2
programme.desc: Marjorie's husband, Irv, has recently been diagnosed with Parkinson's Disease and has already taken two dangerous falls in the house where the EMTs could not get to him.

programme.title: #TextMeWhenYouGetHome (S2) - EP 7
programme.desc: The family of Miya Marcano share the agonising details of what happened around the beautiful 19-year-old's disappearance.

programme.title: City Confidential - EP 18
programme.desc: Historical Bucks County, is alarmed when several young men vanish one after the other within a week. Detectives unearth a ruthless murder spree in this seemingly picture-perfect farming community.

programme.title: Accused: Guilty Or Innocent? (S4) - EP 1
programme.desc: A woman faces life in prison when a passenger in the car she is driving is killed after she collides with an 18-wheel truck. Was she an intoxicated driver, or was it a tragic accident?

programme.title: Search for the Last Unicorn (S1) - EP 1
programme.desc: With exclusive access, the BBC follows an international team of experts on an expedition to a war zone to go in search of the Northern White Rhinoceros. An animal that little is really known about.

programme.title: The Lakes with Simon Reeve (S1) - EP 1
programme.desc: Simon Reeve travels through the glorious Lake District National Park and the county of Cumbria, with its magnificent mountains, glacial valleys and 16 iconic lakes and meres.

programme.title: The World's Deadliest Weather (S5) - EP 6
programme.desc: In Germany, floods tear through central European towns and villages. In Nepal a landslide threatens local communities. In California, wildfires tear through the states forests and farms.

programme.desc: To recover a missing package, the Bears get help from Ranger Tabes, an eccentric forest ranger. But her overblown sense of justice might be too much for the Bears to handle.

programme.title: We Bare Bears S2 - EP 8
programme.desc: Feeling unappreciated, Ice Bear leaves his brothers to be the chef of a restaurant. Desperate to fill the void, Grizz and Panda look for Ice Bear's replacement.

programme.title: We Bare Bears S2 - EP 9
programme.desc: Fed up with sharing, Panda forbids his brothers from using his cellphone any longer. But when the brothers get their own super-advanced smartphones, Panda starts to succumb to crippling jealousy.

programme.title: We Bare Bears S2 - EP 10
programme.desc: To abide by the clothing policy of their favourite Boba shop, the Bears get some new outfits. But with new looks come new lives - including office work, fashion modeling, and even falling in love!

programme.title: We Bare Bears S2 - EP 11
programme.desc: While trying to sail to Japan, the Baby Bears get stranded on an island. Luckily, they meet Dave and Karla, who help with survival on the island, while looking for an escape.

programme.title: We Bare Bears S2 - EP 12
programme.desc: The Bears become terribly ill and Chloe takes it upon herself to take care of them. But things get tricky when word of the Bears' sickness goes viral.

programme.title: We Bare Bears S2 - EP 13
programme.desc: The Baby Bears have an adventure in the sky, on a plane to Sweden. But when the Baby Bears are forced to sit in different sections of the plane, things go haywire for everyone on board.

programme.title: We Bare Bears S2 - EP 14
programme.desc: The Bears are reunited with their pet crab, Captain Craboo. But after an unfortunate run-in with Nom Nom, the Bears may lose their pet forever.

programme.title: We Bare Bears S2 - EP 15
programme.desc: Panda needs to meet his brothers at the most exclusive restaurant in town. But when he loses his contact lenses and can't see, Panda needs Charlie's help to get him into the city.

programme.title: We Bare Bears S2 - EP 16
programme.desc: Ice Bear rides his custom vacuum into the city. But when a gang of techies steals the vacuum, Ice Bear goes on a rescue mission that takes him through the underground world of the city.

programme.title: We Bare Bears S2 - EP 17
programme.desc: The Bears audition to be the next mascot for their favourite cereal. They get so caught up in the process that their competitiveness gets the better of them.

programme.title: We Bare Bears S2 - EP 18
programme.desc: Ranger Tabes tells the Bears she's been investigating a mysterious creature. But when the Bears realise she's actually investigating their friend, Charlie, they split up to ensure Charlie's safety.

programme.title: We Bare Bears S2 - EP 19
programme.desc: Through a standard video-browsing session online, we get a glimpse of the different kinds of videos the Bears have posted.

programme.title: We Bare Bears S2 - EP 20
programme.desc: The Bears find Chloe in the library, exhausted from studying for an exam all day. The Bears stay to help Chloe study, but make things worse in the process.

programme.title: We Bare Bears S2 - EP 21
programme.desc: When his brothers don't need his help for the day, Grizz leaves the cave to assist anyone he can throughout the city.

programme.title: We Bare Bears S2 - EP 22

programme.title: We Bare Bears S2 - EP 23
programme.desc: Baby Ice Bear lives alone in the Arctic and meets a mysterious man named Yuri. Together they help each other survive the cold environment.

programme.title: We Bare Bears S2 - EP 24

programme.title: Sesame Street S54 - EP 23
programme.desc: It's Alphabet Day on Sesame Street. There's alphabet shaped cookies and decorations all around! While Elmo sings the ABC song, his friend Mathis signs the alphabets using American Sign Language. What a great way to celebrate Alphabet Day!

programme.title: Sesame Street S54 - EP 24
programme.desc: Elmo tries to find something to do in the rain while he waits to jump in puddles.

programme.title: Sesame Street S54 - EP 26
programme.desc: Elmo doesn't give up and keeps practicing until he learns how to play the song Twinkle Twinkle Little Star on his piano.

programme.title: Sesame Street S54 - EP 27
programme.desc: Alan has a lot of food deliveries to make at Hooper's and needs vehicles to make the deliveries. Elmo, Charlie, and Rosita help Alan by riding their scooter and bikes to deliver food to customers.

programme.desc: Gabrielle puts on a show to tell her friends about Bessie Coleman, the first African American and Native American woman to fly an airplane. It didn't matter what she looked like. Bessie had courage and didn't give up learning how to fly.

programme.title: Sesame Street S54 - EP 30
programme.desc: Librarian Grover helps Nina and Elmo find the books they need while looking through the different sections of the library.

programme.title: Sesame Street S54 - EP 31
programme.desc: Elmo is feeling excited and a little scared to go down the big slide for the very first time. Chris helps Elmo by holding his hand as he goes down the slide. Elmo doesn't feel scared anymore and is ready to go down the slide again all by himself!

programme.title: Sesame Street S54 - EP 32
programme.desc: Elmo, Chris, and their friends on Sesame Street have dressed up as dinosaurs. With help from Elmo's book, they learn that there are small and big dinosaurs, some dinosaurs are herbivores and some are carnivores and that Big Bird is a dinosaur!

programme.desc: During a book signing at a medieval castle, Ben must stop Hex from getting his hands on a grimoire that can fuse its user with mythical beasts, creating monstrous hybrids!

programme.title: Ben 10 S1 - EP 27
programme.desc: Ben is interested in a marathon of his favourite cartoon show, 'Spazz', but when Ben goes Upgrade to get a better signal, the titular Spazz leaps from his animated dimension, bringing chaos with him!

programme.title: Ben 10 S1 - EP 28
programme.desc: After the Rust Bucket breaks down at a Mobile Home Park, Ben discovers they've stumbled on to the last leg of the Cali 10 Hundred, an epic, off-road auto race.

programme.title: Ben 10 S1 - EP 30
programme.desc: While mini-golfing, Ben is attacked by the Ground Hawgs, a gang of Dr. Animo mutants turned bikers. Ben must turn alien to stop them before they set their sights on the city down the road.

programme.title: Ben 10 S1 - EP 31
programme.desc: Dr. Animo has made a scary transformation and found a way to release the very dangerous animal nature of humans, including Max's life-long friend!

programme.title: Ben 10 S1 - EP 32
programme.desc: Ben discovers Steam Smythe excavating a 'House of the Future' built by Max's childhood idol, in search of a powerful device that will allow him to create devastating weapons for his war on progress.

programme.title: Ben 10 S1 - EP 33
programme.desc: While Ben, Gwen and Max hike to a waterfall, the Bugg Brothers are back with a plan to duplicate Diamondhead, but their cloning ray gun fires on Max instead, multiplying him endlessly.

programme.title: Ben 10 S1 - EP 34
programme.desc: Ben, Gwen and Max revisit their favourite amusement park, renovated and rebranded as AdrenaWORLD. Unfortunately, the new management is Zombozo and his trio of new henchmen!

programme.title: Ben 10 S1 - EP 35
programme.desc: Ben and his arch-enemy, Billy Billions, clash in a duel for supremacy at the world's largest Laser Tag Park, Laser Town when Billy inadvertently ignites a robot rebellion.

programme.title: Ben 10 S1 - EP 36
programme.desc: Ben's holiday to Portland is cut short when he discovers an 11th alien while battling a Dr. Animo Mega-Creature and damages his Omnitrix in a fight.

programme.title: Ben 10 S2 - EP 1
programme.desc: While on a visit to Cape Canaveral, the Tennyson Trio attends the inaugural launch of an experimental space plane. When Vilgax commandeers the ship, Ben must stop him from weaponising the shuttle.

programme.title: Ben 10 S2 - EP 2
programme.desc: After stumbling upon a cute cat-dog-rabbit creature hybrid, or 'Cadobbit', Ben ignores Grandpa Max's advice and sneaks the animal onto the Rustbucket, but is soon in over his head as it turns on him.

programme.title: Ben 10 S2 - EP 3
programme.desc: Ben and Billy Billions go head-to-head over a Sumo Slammer Set sold exclusively inside the world's largest shopping centre, only to find six-year-old Simon Sez has gotten to it first.

programme.title: Ben 10 S2 - EP 4
programme.desc: Aboard the SS Pettigrew on its final voyage, Ben must battle seasickness as well as Steam Smythe, who looks to use his mechanical creatures to sink the steamship's modern replacement.

programme.title: Ben 10 S2 - EP 5
programme.desc: With new Omni-Enhancements in tow, Ben plans on saving a town from a sudden mudslide, but his heroics are short-lived once Vilgax appears to warn him about the Omnitrix's mysterious new alien.

programme.title: Ben 10 S2 - EP 6
programme.desc: After discovering that Vilgax has joined forces with the Weatherheads, Ben must not only overcome his doubts, but must also fully embrace his new powers if he is to beat his foes.

programme.title: Ben 10 S2 - EP 7
programme.desc: When their attempt to get a photo with every storefront mascot is foiled, Ben and Gwen sneak out to get a snap with a wooden bear totem known as 'Yawk' only to find all the mascots have come to life.

programme.title: Ben 10 S2 - EP 8

programme.title: Ben 10 S2 - EP 9

programme.desc: As the Tennysons dig up dinosaur fossils in the Badlands, Ben is unaware that Vilgax and Dr. Amino have teamed up to steal alien DNA from the Omnitrix. Vilgax then double-crosses his fellow villain.

programme.title: Us Money Movers
programme.desc: "Money Movers" provides investors with real-time analysis of the stories and the people attracting the attention of the markets each day. Capturing the energy of day’s early trading, the program includes the breaking news and numbers driving stocks and sectors, helping investors make critical decisions. "Money Movers" anchors speak with the CEOs, government decision-makers and newsmakers who play a relevant role in how money is moving.

programme.title: Us Money Movers
programme.desc: "Money Movers" provides investors with real-time analysis of the stories and the people attracting the attention of the markets each day. Capturing the energy of day’s early trading, the program includes the breaking news and numbers driving stocks and sectors, helping investors make critical decisions. "Money Movers" anchors speak with the CEOs, government decision-makers and newsmakers who play a relevant role in how money is moving.

programme.title: Us Halftime Report
programme.desc: Halftime Report is on the front lines of CNBC's market coverage. Host CNBC’s Scott Wapner and the Street's top investors get to the heart of the action as it's happening and help set the agenda for the rest of the day.

programme.title: Us Halftime Report
programme.desc: Halftime Report is on the front lines of CNBC's market coverage. Host CNBC’s Scott Wapner and the Street's top investors get to the heart of the action as it's happening and help set the agenda for the rest of the day.

programme.title: Us The Exchange
programme.desc: CNBC’s "The Exchange" is the newsroom-based program for today’s Investor. The show focuses on in-depth reporting around the most important and interesting stories to today’s markets and investors. CNBC’s deep roster of skilled reporters, guided by anchor Kelly Evans, provide actionable information to viewers as they make daily investment decisions.

programme.title: Us The Exchange
programme.desc: CNBC’s "The Exchange" is the newsroom-based program for today’s Investor. The show focuses on in-depth reporting around the most important and interesting stories to today’s markets and investors. CNBC’s deep roster of skilled reporters, guided by anchor Kelly Evans, provide actionable information to viewers as they make daily investment decisions.

programme.title: Us Power Lunch
programme.desc: CNBC's Tyler Mathisen and Kelly Evans take you through the heart of the business day bringing you the latest developments and instant analysis on the stocks and stories driving the day’s agenda. Airing CNBC’s award-winning business news coverage, "Power Lunch" delves into the economy, markets, politics, technology and more.

programme.title: Us Power Lunch
programme.desc: CNBC's Tyler Mathisen and Kelly Evans take you through the heart of the business day bringing you the latest developments and instant analysis on the stocks and stories driving the day’s agenda. Airing CNBC’s award-winning business news coverage, "Power Lunch" delves into the economy, markets, politics, technology and more.

programme.title: Us Closing Bell
programme.desc: Anything can happen between the bells of the trading day. But what happens during the last hour could be what matters most. Hosted by CNBC’s Scott Wapner, "Closing Bell" guides you through the most important hour of the trading day. The show takes a close-up look at how the markets are moving, what’s driving them and how investors are reacting.

programme.title: Us Closing Bell
programme.desc: Anything can happen between the bells of the trading day. But what happens during the last hour could be what matters most. Hosted by CNBC’s Scott Wapner, "Closing Bell" guides you through the most important hour of the trading day. The show takes a close-up look at how the markets are moving, what’s driving them and how investors are reacting.

programme.title: Us Closing Bell: Overtime
programme.desc: When the bell rings, the action does not end. "Closing Bell: Overtime" takes you through all of the after-hours moves including breaking news, corporate earnings and post-market trading. Big investors, smart strategists and top money managers debate actionable ideas and the big market themes of the day, and get viewers ready for tomorrow’s trading day.

programme.title: Us Closing Bell: Overtime
programme.desc: When the bell rings, the action does not end. "Closing Bell: Overtime" takes you through all of the after-hours moves including breaking news, corporate earnings and post-market trading. Big investors, smart strategists and top money managers debate actionable ideas and the big market themes of the day, and get viewers ready for tomorrow’s trading day.

programme.title: Us Fast Money
programme.desc: "Fast Money" is America’s post-market show. Hosted by Melissa Lee and a roundtable of top traders, "Fast Money" breaks through the noise of the day, to bring you the actionable news that matters most to investors.

programme.title: Us Fast Money
programme.desc: "Fast Money" is America’s post-market show. Hosted by Melissa Lee and a roundtable of top traders, "Fast Money" breaks through the noise of the day, to bring you the actionable news that matters most to investors.

programme.title: The Cnbc Conversation
programme.desc: A show that lets the person talk for themselves and gives audiences a glimpse at the personality behind the public persona. Heads of State, titans of business and celebrated stars sit down for the CNBC Conversation.

programme.title: Cities Of Success - EP 3
programme.desc: The pandemic and the success of startup culture have sparked the emergence of new hubs for businesses outside of traditional power centers of New York, Chicago, Houston and San Francisco. These Cities of Success each have used unique characteristics - pop culture influence, clusters of great universities, friendly geography or forward-thinking local governments - to attract major companies and nurture an entrepreneurial community around them.

programme.title: Us Closing Bell: Overtime Rpt 2024 - EP 51
programme.desc: When the bell rings, the action does not end. "Closing Bell: Overtime" takes you through all of the after-hours moves including breaking news, corporate earnings and post-market trading. Big investors, smart strategists and top money managers debate actionable ideas and the big market themes of the day, and get viewers ready for tomorrow’s trading day.

programme.title: Channel Japan 2024
programme.desc: Channel Japan offers a fresh look at the latest in the economy, business, technology, culture and sightseeing of Japan.

programme.title: American Greed S1-15
programme.desc: "American Greed" goes inside the dark side of the American Dream - where money seduces, power corrupts, and smooth criminals will stop at nothing to get rich. Their complex scams leave victim's lives in shambles. Each episode is a deep dive into the minds and actions of heartless crooks who live lives most people can only dream of.

programme.title: Pga Tour 2024
programme.desc: Golfing highlights from last weekend's PGA TOUR tournament.

programme.title: Dubai International Baja 2024
programme.desc: Now in its 6th iteration as an FIA Cross Country World Cup event, the Dubai Baja remains along with its big brother the Abu Dhabi Desert Challenge, the longest running Motorsport event in the United Arab Emirates. Based on the coast of the Arabian Gulf makes this spectacular rally one of the most anticipated on the International Calendar.

programme.title: Late Night With Seth Meyers 2024
programme.desc: "Late Night with Seth Meyers" is home to A-list celebrity guests, memorable comedy and topical monologue jokes. It is hosted by Emmy Award-winning writer and one of the 2014 TIME 100, Time magazine’s 100 most influential people, Seth Meyers. Previously, Meyers served as head writer on "Saturday Night Live" and anchor on the show’s wildly popular "Weekend Update."

programme.title: Next in Sports
programme.desc: How Formula One Finally Hooked America. Not so long ago it was the circuits of Monaco and Monza that epitomized Formula 1. Its modern ambitions, however, are more Miami.

programme.title: Next in Sports
programme.desc: How to Build a Brand New Sport. Despite Teqball being relatively unknown, the sport's creators have big plans for it. Can you build any game into a mainstream sport if you have the will and the money?

programme.title: Next in Sports
programme.desc: Next in Sports explores new sports, as well as innovations in existing pastimes, illustrating what's happening around the corner and across the globe.

programme.title: Next in Sports S1 - EP 6
programme.desc: The Pro-League With Players as Bosses. Athletes Unlimited is capitalising on the growing audience for women's softball, volleyball and basketball by investing in the athletes themselves.

programme.title: Next in Sports
programme.desc: Can the Ancient Indian Sport of Kabaddi Someday Rival Cricket? Billionaire businessman Anand Mahindra wants to make the Indian game of Kabaddi number one, in a nation where cricket is king.

programme.title: Bloomberg Investigates S3 - EP 2
programme.desc: The Green Bible is the single-most important document in the Italian government's war against an alleged Nigerian mafia. But this supposed mafia handbook isn't what it claims to be at all.

programme.title: Bloomberg Investigates
programme.desc: Fake permits, undercover informants and millions of dollars. How a US government agency set out to prove suppliers to research labs were importing wild monkeys from Cambodia with false paperwork.

programme.title: Bloomberg Investigates
programme.desc: Last year alone, an estimated $1 trillion was lost globally to fraud. With law enforcement struggling to cope, scambaiter vigilantes are filling the gaps.

programme.title: Bloomberg Investigates
programme.desc: In Texas, a former preacher exploited the trust of his peers under a cloak of religious virtue. This is the intimate story of those whose lives were destroyed by his $38 million dollar Ponzi scheme.

programme.title: RUIN
programme.desc: A feature documentary about Sam Bankman-Fried and the stunning collapse of FTX, his cryptocurrency exchange.

programme.title: The Deal S2 - EP 1

programme.title: The Deal S2 - EP 2
programme.desc: Alex Rodriguez and Jason Kelly talk with David Rubenstein, co-founder of The Carlyle Group, about his recent purchase of the Baltimore Orioles and what the team means for the city.

programme.title: The Deal S2 - EP 3
programme.desc: Alex Rodriguez and Jason Kelly talk with former NBA player Jay Williams about how he pivoted after a career-ending accident, why he founded Improbable Media and what he thinks about NIL deals.

programme.title: The Deal S2 - EP 4
programme.desc: Alex Rodriguez and Jason Kelly talk with Nasdaq CEO Adena Friedman about her competitive deal-making mindset, how she's transformed Nasdaq and the current sports business landscape.

programme.title: Momentum S1 - EP 2
programme.desc: Amid Seoul's pulsating energy, Haslina Amin reveals an architectural renaissance that's reshaping the city, blending tradition with innovation while providing the world a new wave to follow.

programme.title: Momentum S1 - EP 3
programme.desc: Join Haslinda Amin as she explores the way robots and AI are integrated into Japanese life. From drones managing crops to unmanned harvesters, see how it's paving the way to a more efficient future.

programme.title: Momentum S1 - EP 4
programme.desc: South Korea is emerging as a pivotal force in reshaping maritime transportation, leading the way to a future with autonomous ships and more eco-friendly propulsion systems.

programme.title: Hello World S2 - EP 7
programme.desc: Switzerland is full of advanced tech startups. We visit an inventor who makes drones do miraculous things and a company that's growing human skin in a lab.

programme.title: Hello World S2 - EP 8
programme.desc: From a company that helps restore movement in the paralysed to brain-research labs combining neuroscience and AI, Switzerland is home to some of the most advanced research on the brain.

programme.title: Hello World
programme.desc: Burning Man meets Mad Max at King of the Hammers, a 212-mile-long offroad race in the California desert that only the hardiest racers with the most kitted-out vehicles will even finish.

programme.title: Hello World S2 - EP 10
programme.desc: The Nigerian tech boom has been fuelled by payments and mobile tech. As the country looks to leapfrog ahead, it's turning to an ambitious young workforce.

programme.title: Hello World
programme.desc: The Airship Stikes Back. We travel from California to Ohio to the Hindenburg's birthplace in Germany to see if this new old style of aviation can really make a comeback.

programme.title: Hello World S2 - EP 2
programme.desc: The tiny former Soviet nation of Kyrgyzstan hopes to join the global tech economy; we hang out with blockbuster YouTube success D-Billions and learn about a darker side of its society.

programme.title: The Circuit
programme.desc: Inside Mark Zuckerberg's AI Era. Mark Zuckerberg discusses how Meta's newest AI model Llama 3.1 will shape the future of business, technology and society.

programme.title: The Circuit S2 - EP 4
programme.desc: Google & Alphabet CEO Sundar Pichai sits down with Emily Chang to discuss the future of search, accelerating work on Google's AI models and how his upbringing prepared him for this moment.

programme.title: The Circuit S2 - EP 9

programme.title: The Longest Day
programme.desc: Climate change is more than a set of abstract projections and statistics. It's the daily reality for millions of people across the world, living on the frontlines of the climate crisis. The Longest Day is a snapshot of the climate crisis in action - told through the voices of farmers, health workers, city residents and displaced families.

programme.title: The World From Above
programme.desc: The second series of The World from Above flies across some of the most beautiful and dramatic places in the world. In this series, we float over Venice, find four US presidents carved into the rock at Mount Rushmore, circle over twenty chateaux in the Loire Valley and fly up the Danube to find an enormous temple dedicated to Valhalla.

programme.title: Super Octogenarians
programme.desc: Is 80 the new 50? Super Octogenarians track down some spunky seniors who are working way past their retirement age, and redefining the notion of active ageing. We travel across Asia to witness how these gutsy seniors are debunking the stock images we have of the old, and inspiring all with the tremendous energy they put into their extended professional lives.

programme.title: The Night Shift
programme.desc: A documentary program that discusses about people working at night day. What do they do, why they chose the job, as well how they deal with their lives whose cycle is reversed compared to people in general will be discussed in this program.

programme.title: Reality Trip
programme.desc: Follow five young adults as they leave their comfortable lifestyles behind to go on the Reality Trip of a lifetime! Travelling to Sri Lanka, Bangladesh and the Phillippines, the group learn the origins of their favourite brands. From working in cotton fields under a blazing sun, to sleeping on cardboard beds alongside the factory workers; this is a world they were not prepared for. Sparks fly between the group as stress and emotions take over.

programme.title: Super Octogenarians
programme.desc: Is 80 the new 50? Super Octogenarians track down some spunky seniors who are working way past their retirement age, and redefining the notion of active ageing. We travel across Asia to witness how these gutsy seniors are debunking the stock images we have of the old, and inspiring all with the tremendous energy they put into their extended professional lives.

programme.title: The Night Shift
programme.desc: A documentary program that discusses about people working at night day. What do they do, why they chose the job, as well how they deal with their lives whose cycle is reversed compared to people in general will be discussed in this program.

programme.title: Reality Trip
programme.desc: Follow five young adults as they leave their comfortable lifestyles behind to go on the Reality Trip of a lifetime! Travelling to Sri Lanka, Bangladesh and the Phillippines, the group learn the origins of their favourite brands. From working in cotton fields under a blazing sun, to sleeping on cardboard beds alongside the factory workers; this is a world they were not prepared for. Sparks fly between the group as stress and emotions take over.

He or she will introduce viewers to people who are dedicating their lives to its protection, inheritance, innovation, development and promotion.

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The core rolling news service of CGTN, with regular updates from Beijing, Washington, Nairobi and London, keep viewers up-to-date with all the world’s top stories as they happen. The World Today delivers breaking news, live events, in-depth reporting, expert analysis and sustained coverage.

programme.title: Sports Scene
programme.desc: Sports Scene brings you closer to all the action from all corners of the world, with highlights from across Europe, North America and China's top sports leagues. We examine the changes and growth in China's domestic leagues, as the country undergoes an incredible economic transformation.

programme.title: Leaders Talk
programme.desc: Leaders Talk is China Media Group’s new current affairs program featuring one-on-one interviews with heads of state and high-ranking government officials and heads of international organizations. They will share their insights on the major events shaping today’s world, providing an international viewpoint to understand our times, the visions we share, the challenges we face and the efforts we can make for a better future.

programme.title: Global Watch
programme.desc: GLOBAL WATCH is a 60 minute-long news program. The show stresses Chinese elements, emphasizing China’s perspective, policies and stories. The program, relying on global reporting resources, presents in-depth analysis and coverage of major global issues, from a Chinese perspective on international affairs. The program presents to-the-point interpretation of Chinese policies and stories that are of interest to foreign audiences, in a style they are familiar with.

programme.title: Full Frame
programme.desc: Full Frame is a one hour program from CGTN America._x000D_Full Frame enriches the lives of viewers through animated discussion of film, arts and culture, humanitarian work, science, technology, innovation and social trends impacting a diverse global audience._x000D_Produced in Los Angeles, Full Frame is a unique CGTN production. programme.title: Drama Serial "Carnation" Encore Eps. 72
programme.desc: A heroine born into a kimono store family in Kishiwada, Osaka, holds admiration for clothing and discovers a sewing machine. Despite her father’s opposition, she is undeterred and pursues her passion for dressmaking. She opens a store at age 20 and gets married, but her husband dies in the war. The story depicts the life of a powerful woman who becomes a pioneer of Japan’s fashion design while overcoming many obstacles.

programme.title: Project X: The Challengers
programme.desc: Project X returns for the first time in 18 years. The former series featured people involved in project related to the Japanese industry and contemporary history. The new series focuses on people in the "Lost Era" following the collapse of the bubble economy. In every era, there are always those take on challenges. Even without receiving praise or being in the spotlight, some dedicate themselves to their work. The documentary delivers passion and courage right to you.

programme.title: Premium Drama "Kiriko's Crime Diary" Eps. 4 (R)
programme.desc: Hitotsubashi Kiriko (Matsuzaka Keiko) is in deep sorrow. While it was hard enough to making her life living on her pension and part-time income, she is struck with a sense of emptiness and despair after the death of her best friend from an illness. One day, Kiriko is inspired by the words of an arrestee she saw on TV, who said, "I have no regrets in my life, and I committed the crime only to go to prison," and she sets her final home as "prison".

programme.title: Historical Drama "Dear Radiance" Eps. 48 (Final)

After that, Mahiro meets an unknown woman who gets interested in "The Tale of Genji" and hears unexpected opinions. As time goes by, Michinaga realizes that his own end is near and makes his final decision while witnessing the deaths of the courtiers who has supported the country with him and his beloved family.

programme.title: A Beautiful Mind - EP 14
programme.desc: Hyunsung Hospital is the best national hospital with the most advanced medical techniques. Although it is obvious that it is the safest place to be in the country, something mysterious is happening inside the hospital. What is the truth? Who is the criminal? Lee Yeongo is an elite neurosurgeon. He may win recognition from the patients but when he is alone, he feels empty deep in the mind. There is no compassion or emotion for him. Could we think of him as good?
